text: Dictation can refer to: *Dictation (exercise), when one person speaks while another person transcribes *Dictation: A Quartet, a collection of short stories by Cynthia Ozick, published in 2008 *Digital dictation, the use of digital electronic media for dictation *Music dictation, an ear training exercise in which the student copies down music while listening to it ==See also== *Dictatorship *Dication
title: Dictation
